<style>
    /* AJUSTES DARK MODE */
    body { background-color: #0f172a !important; color: #e2e8f0; font-family: 'Segoe UI', sans-serif; overflow: hidden; }
    
    /* Contenedor Principal (Pantalla completa) */
    .main-wrapper { height: 100vh; display: flex; flex-direction: column; padding: 20px 40px; box-sizing: border-box; max-width: 1600px; margin: 0 auto; }

    /* Pestañas */
    .tab-active { background-color: #1e293b; color: #2dd4bf; border: 1px solid #2dd4bf; }
    .tab-inactive { background-color: #0f172a; color: #94a3b8; border: 1px solid #334155; }
    .tab-inactive:hover { background-color: #1e293b; color: #fff; }
    
    /* Tarjetas */
    .card-dark { background-color: #1e293b; border: 1px solid #334155; box-shadow: 0 4px 6px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5); border-radius: 0.75rem; }
    
    /* Inputs y Tablas */
    input { background-color: #0f172a !important; border-color: #334155 !important; color: #fff !important; }
    thead { background-color: #0f172a !important; color: #94a3b8; }
    tr:hover { background-color: rgba(45, 212, 191, 0.05) !important; }
    td { border-color: #334155 !important; color: #cbd5e1; }
    
    /* Scrollbar */
    ::-webkit-scrollbar { width: 8px; }
    ::-webkit-scrollbar-track { background: #0f172a; }
    ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb { background: #334155; border-radius: 4px; }
    ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover { background: #475569; }

    .fade-in { animation: fadeIn 0.3s ease-in; }
    @keyframes fadeIn { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(10px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } }

    /* Layout Específico */
    .dashboard-split { flex: 1; display: grid; grid-template-columns: 70% 28%; justify-content: space-between; gap: 20px; min-height: 0; }
    .panel { background: #1e293b; border: 1px solid #334155; border-radius: 12px; display: flex; flex-direction: column; height: 100%; overflow: hidden; }
    .table-scroll-area { flex: 1; overflow-y: auto; padding: 0; }
    
    /* Tabla Alineada */
    .mini-table { width: 100%; border-collapse: collapse; font-size: 0.85rem; table-layout: fixed; }
    .mini-table th { position: sticky; top: 0; background: #0f172a; color: #94a3b8; z-index: 10; text-align: left; padding: 10px 15px; border-bottom: 1px solid #334155; }
    .mini-table td { padding: 10px 15px; border-bottom: 1px solid #334155; white-space: nowrap; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis; vertical-align: middle; }
    
    .col-empresa { width: 50%; }
    .col-dato { width: 20%; text-align: right; font-weight: 700; font-family: 'Segoe UI Mono', monospace; }
    .col-trend { width: 15%; text-align: center; }
    .col-action { width: 15%; text-align: center; }
</style>

                    <div class="card-dark p-5">
                        <h3 class="font-bold text-white mb-4 text-xs uppercase tracking-wider">1. Añadir Competidores</h3>

<script>
    Chart.defaults.color = '#64748b';
    Chart.defaults.borderColor = '#334155';
    Chart.defaults.font.family = "'Segoe UI', sans-serif";

    let DB = [];
    let YEARS = [2023, 2024]; // Default min
    
    let marketChartInstance = null;
    let comparatorChartInstance = null;
    let modalChartInstance = null;
    let selectedCompetitors = [];
    let comparatorMode = 'absolute';

    const fmtNum = (n) => new Intl.NumberFormat('es-ES', { maximumFractionDigits: 0 }).format(n);
    const fmtEur = (n) => new Intl.NumberFormat('es-ES', { style: 'currency', currency: 'EUR', maximumFractionDigits: 0 }).format(n);
    const calcCAGR = (start, end, periods) => (start > 0 && periods > 0) ? ((Math.pow(end / start, 1 / periods) - 1) * 100).toFixed(2) : 0;

    // --- CARGA DE DATOS SIMPLE (Tu CSV corregido) ---
    async function loadData() {
        try {
            const response = await fetch('ventas_boe.csv');
            if (!response.ok) throw new Error("CSV no encontrado");
            const text = await response.text();
            
            // Separar líneas (sin hacks raros, solo CSV normal)
            const lines = text.split('\n').map(l => l.trim()).filter(l => l);
            if(lines.length < 2) return;

            // Headers: NIF;Empresa;Ventas 2020...
            const headers = lines[0].split(';');
            const yearMapping = [];
            
            headers.forEach((h, i) => {
                // Buscamos cualquier cosa que parezca un año (20XX)
                const match = h.match(/20\d{2}/);
                if (match) yearMapping.push({ index: i, year: parseInt(match[0]) });
            });

            if(yearMapping.length > 0) {
                // Ordenar años detectados (2020, 2021...)
                YEARS = [...new Set(yearMapping.map(y => y.year))].sort((a,b) => a - b);
            }

            const newDB = [];
            for (let i = 1; i < lines.length; i++) {
                const cols = lines[i].split(';');
                if (cols.length < 2) continue;
                
                const cif = cols[0].trim().toUpperCase();
                const name = cols[1].trim();
                const sales = {};
                
                yearMapping.forEach(ym => {
                    if (cols[ym.index]) {
                        // El CSV ya está limpio, pero por si acaso aseguramos formato numérico
                        // (Si viene 1.000,00 -> quita punto, cambia coma por punto)
                        let valStr = cols[ym.index].trim();
                        // Solo procesamos si no es vacío
                        if(valStr) {
                            if(valStr.includes(',') && valStr.includes('.')) { 
                                valStr = valStr.replace(/\./g, '').replace(',', '.'); 
                            } else if(valStr.includes(',')) {
                                valStr = valStr.replace(',', '.');
                            }
                            sales[ym.year] = parseFloat(valStr) || 0;
                        } else {
                            sales[ym.year] = 0;
                        }
                    }
                });

                if (cif && name) newDB.push({ cif, name, sales });
            }
            
            DB = newDB;
            document.getElementById('rows-count').innerText = DB.length;
            renderDashboard();

        } catch (err) {
            console.error("Error loading CSV:", err);
        }
    }

    // --- RENDERIZADO ---
    function switchTab(tabId) {
        ['dashboard', 'comparator'].forEach(t => {
            document.getElementById('view-' + t).classList.add('hidden');
            document.getElementById('btn-' + t).className = 'tab-inactive px-4 py-2 rounded-lg text-sm font-medium transition-all flex items-center gap-2 cursor-pointer';
        });
        document.getElementById('view-' + tabId).classList.remove('hidden');
        document.getElementById('btn-' + tabId).className = 'tab-active px-4 py-2 rounded-lg text-sm font-medium transition-all flex items-center gap-2 cursor-default';
        if(tabId === 'comparator') updateComparatorChart();
    }

    function renderDashboard() {
        if(DB.length === 0) return;
        
        const lastYear = YEARS[YEARS.length - 1];
        const prevYear = YEARS.length > 1 ? YEARS[YEARS.length - 2] : lastYear;

        let totalSalesLast = 0;
        let topGrower = { name: '-', growth: -Infinity };

        DB.forEach(c => {
            const sLast = c.sales[lastYear] || 0;
            const sPrev = c.sales[prevYear] || 0;
            totalSalesLast += sLast;
            
            const growth = sLast - sPrev;
            if (growth > topGrower.growth) topGrower = { name: c.name, growth: growth };
        });

        document.getElementById('kpi-total-companies').innerText = DB.length;
        document.getElementById('kpi-total-sales').innerText = fmtNum(totalSalesLast) + ' GWh';
        document.getElementById('kpi-total-cost').innerText = fmtEur(totalSalesLast * 239000).slice(0,-2) + ' M€';
        document.getElementById('kpi-top-grower-name').innerText = topGrower.name;
        document.getElementById('kpi-top-grower-val').innerText = '+' + fmtNum(topGrower.growth) + ' GWh';

        renderTable(DB);
        renderMarketChart();
    }

    function renderTable(data) {
        const lastYear = YEARS[YEARS.length - 1];
        const prevYear = YEARS.length > 1 ? YEARS[YEARS.length - 2] : lastYear;
        const tbody = document.getElementById('companies-table-body');
        tbody.innerHTML = '';
        
        const sorted = [...data].sort((a,b) => (b.sales[lastYear]||0) - (a.sales[lastYear]||0)).slice(0, 100);

        sorted.forEach(c => {
            const sLast = c.sales[lastYear] || 0;
            const sPrev = c.sales[prevYear] || 0;
            const trend = sPrev > 0 ? ((sLast - sPrev)/sPrev * 100).toFixed(1) : 0;
            const trendClass = trend >= 0 ? 'bg-emerald-500/10 text-emerald-400' : 'bg-rose-500/10 text-rose-400';
            
            const row = `
                <tr class="border-b border-slate-800 hover:bg-slate-800 transition-colors">
                    <td class="px-4 py-3">
                        <div class="font-bold text-white truncate max-w-[250px]" title="${c.name}">${c.name}</div>
                        <div class="text-[10px] text-slate-500 font-mono">${c.cif}</div>
                    </td>
                    <td class="px-4 py-3 text-right font-mono text-slate-300 font-bold">${fmtNum(sLast)}</td>
                    <td class="px-4 py-3 text-center">
                        <span class="text-[10px] px-2 py-1 rounded-full font-bold ${trendClass}">${trend > 0 ? '+' : ''}${trend}%</span>
                    </td>
                    <td class="px-4 py-3 text-center">
                        <button onclick="openModal('${c.cif}')" class="text-slate-400 hover:text-blue-400 transition">
                            <i class="fa-solid fa-eye"></i>
                        </button>
                    </td>
                </tr>
            `;
            tbody.innerHTML += row;
        });
    }

    function renderMarketChart() {
        const ctx = document.getElementById('marketChart').getContext('2d');
        const totals = YEARS.map(y => DB.reduce((sum, c) => sum + (c.sales[y]||0), 0));

        if(marketChartInstance) marketChartInstance.destroy();

        marketChartInstance = new Chart(ctx, {
            type: 'bar',
            data: {
                labels: YEARS,
                datasets: [{
                    label: 'Volumen (GWh)',
                    data: totals,
                    backgroundColor: '#2dd4bf',
                    borderRadius: 4,
                    barThickness: 'flex',
                    maxBarThickness: 40
                }]
            },
            options: {
                responsive: true,
                maintainAspectRatio: false,
                plugins: { legend: { display: false } },
                scales: { y: { beginAtZero: true, grid: { color: '#1e293b' } }, x: { grid: { display: false } } }
            }
        });
    }

    function filterTable() {
        const term = document.getElementById('search-input').value.toLowerCase();
        const filtered = DB.filter(c => c.name.toLowerCase().includes(term) || c.cif.toLowerCase().includes(term));
        renderTable(filtered);
    }

    // --- COMPARADOR ---
    function searchCompetitor() {
        const term = document.getElementById('comp-search').value.toLowerCase();
        const resultsDiv = document.getElementById('comp-results');
        resultsDiv.innerHTML = '';
        
        if(term.length < 2) { resultsDiv.classList.add('hidden'); return; }

        const matches = DB.filter(c => c.name.toLowerCase().includes(term) && !selectedCompetitors.includes(c.cif)).slice(0, 10);
        
        if(matches.length > 0) {
            resultsDiv.classList.remove('hidden');
            matches.forEach(c => {
                const div = document.createElement('div');
                div.className = 'p-2 hover:bg-slate-700 cursor-pointer text-xs border-b border-slate-700 text-slate-300';
                div.innerHTML = `<strong>${c.name}</strong> <span class="text-slate-500">(${c.cif})</span>`;
                div.onclick = () => addCompetitor(c.cif);
                resultsDiv.appendChild(div);
            });
        } else { resultsDiv.classList.add('hidden'); }
    }

    function addCompetitor(cif) {
        if(selectedCompetitors.length >= 5) { alert("Máximo 5"); return; }
        selectedCompetitors.push(cif);
        document.getElementById('comp-search').value = '';
        document.getElementById('comp-results').classList.add('hidden');
        renderSelectedChips();
        updateComparatorChart();
    }

    function removeCompetitor(cif) {
        selectedCompetitors = selectedCompetitors.filter(c => c !== cif);
        renderSelectedChips();
        updateComparatorChart();
    }

    function renderSelectedChips() {
        const container = document.getElementById('selected-comps');
        container.innerHTML = '';
        const colors = ['#3b82f6', '#ec4899', '#22c55e', '#f97316', '#8b5cf6'];
        
        selectedCompetitors.forEach((cif, idx) => {
            const comp = DB.find(c => c.cif === cif);
            const div = document.createElement('div');
            div.className = 'flex items-center justify-between p-2 bg-slate-900 rounded border border-slate-700 text-xs text-white';
            div.innerHTML = `<div class="flex items-center gap-2 overflow-hidden"><div class="w-2 h-2 rounded-full flex-shrink-0" style="background:${colors[idx]}"></div><span class="truncate">${comp.name}</span></div><button onclick="removeCompetitor('${cif}')" class="text-slate-500 hover:text-rose-500"><i class="fa-solid fa-times"></i></button>`;
            container.appendChild(div);
        });
    }

    function setChartMode(mode) {
        comparatorMode = mode;
        const btnAbs = document.getElementById('mode-abs');
        const btnIdx = document.getElementById('mode-idx');
        if(mode === 'absolute') {
            btnAbs.className = "w-full text-left px-3 py-2 rounded mb-2 text-xs font-medium bg-emerald-500/10 text-emerald-400 border border-emerald-500/50";
            btnIdx.className = "w-full text-left px-3 py-2 rounded text-xs font-medium bg-slate-900 text-slate-400 border border-slate-700 hover:bg-slate-700";
        } else {
            btnAbs.className = "w-full text-left px-3 py-2 rounded mb-2 text-xs font-medium bg-slate-900 text-slate-400 border border-slate-700 hover:bg-slate-700";
            btnIdx.className = "w-full text-left px-3 py-2 rounded text-xs font-medium bg-emerald-500/10 text-emerald-400 border border-emerald-500/50";
        }
        updateComparatorChart();
    }

    function updateComparatorChart() {
        const ctx = document.getElementById('comparatorChart').getContext('2d');
        const colors = ['#3b82f6', '#ec4899', '#22c55e', '#f97316', '#8b5cf6'];
        
        const datasets = selectedCompetitors.map((cif, idx) => {
            const comp = DB.find(c => c.cif === cif);
            let data = YEARS.map(y => comp.sales[y] || 0);
            if (comparatorMode === 'indexed') {
                const base = data[0] || 1; 
                data = data.map(v => (v/base)*100);
            }
            return { label: comp.name, data: data, borderColor: colors[idx], backgroundColor: colors[idx], borderWidth: 2, tension: 0.3, pointRadius: 3 };
        });

        if(comparatorChartInstance) comparatorChartInstance.destroy();

        comparatorChartInstance = new Chart(ctx, {
            type: 'line',
            data: { labels: YEARS, datasets: datasets },
            options: {
                responsive: true,
                maintainAspectRatio: false,
                interaction: { mode: 'index', intersect: false },
                scales: { y: { beginAtZero: false, grid: { color: '#1e293b' } }, x: { grid: { display: false } } },
                plugins: { legend: { display: false } }
            }
        });

        // Tabla
        const tbody = document.getElementById('comp-table-body');
        tbody.innerHTML = '';
        const startY = YEARS[0], endY = YEARS[YEARS.length-1];
        
        selectedCompetitors.forEach(cif => {
            const comp = DB.find(c => c.cif === cif);
            const sStart = comp.sales[startY] || 0;
            const sEnd = comp.sales[endY] || 0;
            const growth = sStart > 0 ? ((sEnd - sStart)/sStart * 100).toFixed(1) : 0;
            const cagr = calcCAGR(sStart, sEnd, YEARS.length - 1);
            
            tbody.innerHTML += `<tr class="border-b border-slate-700"><td class="py-2 truncate max-w-[120px]" title="${comp.name}">${comp.name}</td><td class="text-right text-slate-500">${fmtNum(sStart)}</td><td class="text-right font-bold text-white">${fmtNum(sEnd)}</td><td class="text-right text-blue-400">${cagr}%</td><td class="text-right ${growth>=0?'text-emerald-400':'text-rose-400'}">${growth}%</td></tr>`;
        });
    }

    // --- MODAL ---
    function openModal(cif) {
        const comp = DB.find(c => c.cif === cif);
        if(!comp) return;
        const lastY = YEARS[YEARS.length-1];
        const sLast = comp.sales[lastY] || 0;
        
        document.getElementById('modal').classList.remove('hidden');
        document.getElementById('modal-cif').innerText = comp.cif;
        document.getElementById('modal-name').innerText = comp.name;
        document.getElementById('modal-sales-24').innerText = fmtNum(sLast);
        
        // Chart Modal
        const ctx = document.getElementById('modalChart').getContext('2d');
        if(modalChartInstance) modalChartInstance.destroy();
        modalChartInstance = new Chart(ctx, {
            type: 'line',
            data: {
                labels: YEARS,
                datasets: [{ label: 'Ventas', data: YEARS.map(y => comp.sales[y]||0), borderColor: '#2563eb', backgroundColor: 'rgba(37, 99, 235, 0.1)', fill: true }]
            },
            options: { responsive: true, maintainAspectRatio: false, scales: { y: { beginAtZero: true, grid: {color:'#1e293b'} } } }
        });
    }
    
    function closeModal() { document.getElementById('modal').classList.add('hidden'); }

    // ARRANCAR
    loadData();
</script>
